title: Best of The Herd for Oct 07, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 07, 2020
description:
-LeBron is finally getting breaks and he's taking advantage of them

-The Cowboys are delusional and trying to sell everyone a lie

-Brady is crushing all of the doubts people had about his abilities

-Colin defends Rodgers being a little cocky


Guests: Gerald McCoy, NFL DT, 6x Pro Bowler

Cris Collinsworth, NBC's Sunday Night Football
